name: Interminal
description:
Can you find your gate?

No one has found their own yet...

Can you find a toilet?

The legends say people who went looking never came back...

Truly an architect's masterpiece, a CEOs dream, in the Interminal, you can only do one thing: SHOP!

..or just watch the planes go by..

Made for #procjam and #7dfps 2020

  • By Ivan and Ferran
  • Music by YenTing
